item.title: Soccer – Green & Blue Bean bag leather
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: The plush and fun Round Soccer Ball Bean Bag offers comfortable, eye-catching seating to any space. Made of matte-finished vinyl with double-stitched seams, comfy and durable design is perfect for relaxing,
item.content:encoded:
The plush and fun Round Soccer Ball Bean Bag offers comfortable, eye-catching seating to any space. Made of matte-finished vinyl with double-stitched seams, comfy and durable design is perfect for relaxing, reading, playing video games, or watching TV.
– Tough, stain resistant, easily cleaned with damp cloth, and waterproof artificial leather fabric
– Filled with Teddy beans that conform to you, not the other way around;
– Newer, smaller, and 20-percent denser teddy beans
– Double stitched and double zippers for added strength and safety
– Spot clean

item.title: Clay Brown – Classic Sack – Leather bean bag
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: Clay brown(Tan) in color classic sack model teardrop shaped beanbag Fabric: Arificial Leather Double stitching Safe velcro with zipper. Fabric warranty _ Artificial leather : 7 months Classic sack model
item.content:encoded:
• Clay brown(Tan) in color classic sack model teardrop shaped beanbag
  • Fabric: Arificial Leather
  • Double stitching
  • Safe velcro with zipper.
  • Fabric warranty _ Artificial leather : 7 months
  • Classic sack model or traditionally known as teardrop shape beanbag is the most popular and common design in bean bag category. Its sack shape gives multiple ways to sit on it. This bean bag can be used for sitting, laid back positions based on your purpose.
Material Leather
Size Kids (XL), Teen (XXL), Adult (XXXL), Jumbo, King
Dimensions XL : 70cm (L) x 70cm(B) x 70cm(H) 

XXL : 77cm (L) x 77cm(B) x 78cm(H)

XXXL : 85cm (L) x 85cm(B) x 85cm(H)

JUMBO : 90cm (L) x 90cm(B) x 95cm(H)

KING : 100cm (L) x 100cm(B) x 105cm(H)
